item.description:
This is the fourth annual Superhero 5K.


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

If you want to set up a team, feel free to start dialogue. I'll probably take the 0730 or 0830 bus #70 from "Carter St opp Commuter Rail Station @42.374641,-71.235374" into Cambridge. From there it is about a .4 mile walk to the race start at 82 Pacific Street in Cambridge. If you'd like to meet up to take the bus, then let me know. Otherwise, we can all meet outside Pacific Street Cafe (70 Pacific Street; Cambridge, MA) at 0930... 30 minutes before race start!

 

You can register for the event at:

http://racewire.com/register.php?id=1851

 

Lots more details below 

General Information Event Name: Fourth Annual Superhero 5K Start Date: 10/28/2012 Start Time: 10 : 00 AM End Time: 12 : 00 PM Location: 82 Pacific St, Cambridge, MA, 02139
Cambridge, Massachusetts 02139
Contact Information Event Contact Name: Race Director Event Contact Email: info@have2run.com Event Contact Website: www.have2run.com
Event Information ABOUT THIS EVENT Come out and run our 4th Annual Superhero 5K. Dress up as your favorite Superhero! Set that Personal Best your have always been chasing dressed up as your favorite Superhero! COURSE Mostly flat 5k through Cambridge from Central Square towards Harvard Square and back. USATF Certified 5K course. TEE SHIRTS The first 750 runners will receive a Technical Tee Shirt. New this year we are offering a LADIES CUT shirt for our female runners. LADIES - If you want a loose shirt, pick a mens cut if you want a fitted shirt pick a womens cut shirt. Ladies Cut typically run small. ALL PARTIPCANTS WILL RECEIVE THE SHIRT SIZE THEY PRE-ORDER. THERE WILL BE NO CHANGING OF SIZE AT RACE PICK-UP. RACE FEES EARLY BIRD FEES | $25 for Individual, $50 for Heroes vs Villains, $90 for Fantastic Four, $155 for Magnificent Seven FEES AFTER May 29 | $30 for Individual, $60 for Heroes vs Villains, $105 for Fantastic Four,$165 for Magnificent Seven FEES OCT 1st/Race Day | $35 for Individual, $70 for Heroes vs Villains, $120 for Fantastic Four, $200 for Magnificent Seven Sub Events Sub Event Name: Cost ($): Distance: Individual 5K $30.00 5km Heroes vs. Villains **One Person Registers The Entire Team** $60.00 5km Fantastic Four **One Person Registers The Entire Team** $105.00 5km Magnificent Seven **One Person Registers The Entire Team** $175.00 5km
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at Bus Stop at Carter Street Commuter Rail or Pacific Street Cafe in Cambridge; Detail below...
item.name: 2012 Superhero 5K
